subject: The Chairman of the Board
body:
The Chairman of the Board
and Chief Executive Officer
Of Bank of America
Attention: my good friend ?
The attached file here is the copy of your  Payment Interest tax
refund sum of US$870,000.00  through International Certified Bank
Draft, that issued to you by the world bank and America government and
clear it in any bank of your choice over there  without any problem
immediately you receive it
 I will advise you to please and confirm
your information again to us your full name and your house address and
your telephone
number and 
the copy of your passport
 to us so that we can able to use
it and not with the one who have hair in our office and know whether
you are the real beneficiary of this bank Draft check
On behalf of
Bank of America
From Mr. Phillips  Edward
The Chairman of the Board
and Chief Executive Officer
Of Bank of America

subject: Re: The Chairman of the Board
body:
Hello Mr. Phillips Edward,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm thrilled to hear about this Payment Interest tax refund. It's not every day that one gets such good news!

I'm curious, how was my name selected for this? And could you please explain a bit more about the process of clearing the Certified Bank Draft in my local bank?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ursula
